metadata.title: CVE-2020-6105 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An exploitable code execution vulnerability exists in the multiple devices functionality of F2fs-Tools F2fs.Fsck 1.13. A specially crafted f2fs filesystem can cause Information overwrite resulting in a code execution. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: f2fs-tools package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
